thread.title: Tiny room but works for business travel
thread.title_full: Tiny room but works for business travel - Review of Pod 39 Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: mandarinchik1
title: Tiny room but works for business travel
text:
The room I was in had a full size bed, small shower and little table with a tv hanging from the wall. The bathroom is literally 2 feet or less away from the bed so if traveling as a couple it might be a problem. It worked for me as I was traveling alone for business. I wish it would have been a bit more cleaner- I feel like carpet was a bit wet from shower leaking into the room. The room was literally a pod but very cute and modern.
Room Tip: Small but works if travel alone See more room tips
